## Imports 
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(skimr)
library(dplyr)
```

## Import the first 300 rows and print dataset summary
```{r}
failure_rate <- read_excel("BIT-446-RS-T4-T5-FailureRate.xlsx", n_max = 300)

# Print head
head(failure_rate)

# Print tail
tail(failure_rate)

# Print skimr dataset summary
skim(failure_rate)

# 
model_summary <- failure_rate %>%
  group_by(model_version) %>%
  summarise(
    total_units = n(),
    failure_rate = mean(failure),
    .groups = 'drop'
  )

print(model_summary)
```
